pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Interactive Collapsible Trees with the JavaScript 'D3' Library // Create and customize interactive collapsible 'D3' trees using the 'D3' JavaScript library and the 'htmlwidgets' package. These trees can be used directly from the R console, from 'RStudio', in Shiny apps and R Markdown documents. When in Shiny the tree layout is observed by the server and can be used as a reactive filter of structured data.
